locutie.beschrijving: The preacher explores the final word of Jesus in Luke, contrasting it with the cry of dereliction in Matthew/Mark, and framing the Christian life as a tension between abandonment and trust.
locutie.exegetische_kwaliteit: High. Uses comparative Gospel analysis (prism metaphor) and historical-theological context (Newbigin, Tolkien).

illocutie.beschrijving: Primarily asserting theological truths and explaining the 'tension' of faith, with a late shift toward promising and directing.
voorbeelden: I have been making the point that...
The accounts of Mark and Matthew have a particular feature...
The Christian life is a struggle against the powers...

perlocutie.beoogd_effect: Comfort, vigilance, and a sense of security in the face of death.
perlocutie.pneumatologisch_bewustzijn: Low. The Spirit is not explicitly mentioned as the agent of the word's effect.

voorbeelden: The accounts of Mark and Matthew have a particular feature in common.
Luke and John both share in the cosmology of all the New Testament writers.
The Christian life is a struggle against the powers of Sin and Death.
Let these words sink into your ears.
Give yourself up in this hour.
I do not like to think what we would have lost.
I have long cherished something said to me.
I think any preacher... must feel that his or her words are very feeble.
The Father of Jesus has his hand on you in some way.
The guarantee that life lived in this tension... is the place where we will most certainly find our Lord.
commissieven.kwaliteit: Moderate. The promises are indirect and descriptive rather than direct 'I promise you' forms.

voorbeelden: Our time together is drawing to a close.
The Father of Jesus has his hand on you.
declaratieven.autoriteit: Low. The preacher speaks more as a fellow-traveler than a mandatory of God.

indicatoren: Extensive use of literary and historical quotes (Tolkien, O'Connor, Eliot).
Long sections of 'talking about' the differences between Gospels.
constatief_surplus_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: The hearer becomes an observer of a theological lecture rather than a participant in a divine encounter.

missende_elementen: Direct address of the promise to the 'you' earlier in the sermon
performatief_deficit_analyse.effect_op_hoorder: Delayed encounter; the 'event' only happens in the final paragraph.

toezegging_check.kwaliteit_toezeggen: Soft and pastoral, but lacks the 'Thus says the Lord' sharpness.
voorbeelden: The Father of Jesus has his hand on you in some way. You can trust that.

eerste_persoon.gebruik: Personal anecdotes and homiletical humility ('I have been making', 'I think').

tweede_persoon.gebruik: Direct address to the congregation, mostly concentrated in the conclusion.
tweede_persoon.performatieve_context: Used to offer comfort and trust at the very end.

derde_persoon.gebruik: Describing Jesus, the Evangelists, and theological concepts.
derde_persoon.distantie_effect: Creates a 'classroom' atmosphere for the majority of the text.

actueel_present.gebruik: The immediate moment in the pews.

sacramenteel_patroon.beschrijving: Moves from Assertive (Gospel comparison) to a brief Commissive (God's hand on you) to Directive (Commit yourself).
voorbeelden: The Father... has his hand on you (Commissive) -> You can trust that (Directive/Commissive) -> Commit yourself (Directive).
sacramenteel_patroon.kwaliteit: The pattern is present but compressed into the final 5% of the text.

voorbeelden_goede_verhouding: The Father... has his hand on you... You can give yourself up.

diagnostische_evaluatie.diagnose_toelichting: The sermon functions primarily as a high-level theological meditation. It informs the mind about the 'tension' of faith but waits until the very end to perform the grace it describes.

sterke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: The tension between 'My God, my God' and 'Father, into thy hands'.
sterke_punten.effect: Provides a robust intellectual framework for suffering.

zwakke_punten.tekstueel_bewijs: Long quotes from Tolkien and O'Connor.
zwakke_punten.probleem: The preacher quotes others rather than speaking for God.

diagnostische_evaluatie.gebeuren_toelichting: It is an 'event' only in the final moments; otherwise, it is a lecture on an event.
diagnostische_evaluatie.sacramentele_toelichting: Lacks the 'I forgive you' or 'God promises you' directness that characterizes sacramental speech.

openbaringsleer.prediker_als_mandataris: Weak. The preacher speaks more as an essayist.
tekstueel_bewijs: I think any preacher... must feel that his or her words are very feeble.

pneumatologie.perlocutie_theologie: Implicitly left to the hearer's response to the hymn.

sacramentstheologie.preek_als_genademiddel: Partially. The final 'toezegging' (promise) acts as a means of grace.
sacramentstheologie.epifanisch_taalgebruik: Moderate. The prism metaphor is epiphanic.
tekstueel_bewijs: Turning a prism to catch different colors.

aanbevelingen.werkwoord_audit_samenvatting: Too many 3rd person 'is' and 'was' verbs. Needs more 2nd person present tense 'gives' and 'promises'.

specifieke_suggesties.huidige_formulering: The Christian life is a struggle against the powers of Sin and Death.
specifieke_suggesties.voorgestelde_revisie: In your struggle against Sin and Death, Christ stands with you now.
specifieke_suggesties.verschil: Shifts from a general definition to a direct address.

toezegging_versterking.probleem: The promise is buried in the conclusion.
toezegging_versterking.suggestie: Interweave the promise of God's 'hand' throughout the analysis of the text.
voorbeeldzinnen: Because Jesus commended his spirit, your spirit is now safe in the Father's hands.

adressering_verbetering.suggestie: Address the 'person in great pain' in the pews directly.
voorbeeldzinnen: You, who are in pain today, hear this: God has not forsaken you.

indicatief_imperatief_herstel.probleem: The foundation is solid, just distant.
indicatief_imperatief_herstel.suggestie: Bring the indicative closer to the hearer's present reality.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The sermon is theologically rich and intellectually stimulating, but it risks remaining a 'talk about' God. By moving the 'toezegging' from the periphery to the center, it would become a true sacramental event.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_schulz_von_thun: SAT reveals that the preacher isn't just 'sending a message' about trust, but is attempting to 'perform' the act of placing the hearer in God's hands.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retoriek: While rhetorically elegant, the SAT analysis shows a lack of illocutionary variety (mostly Assertives).
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_SAT: SAT highlights that the 'feeble words' the preacher laments are actually the tools of the 'Declarative' act if used with divine authority.

kernzinnen_analyse.zin: The Father of Jesus has his hand on you in some way.
kernzinnen_analyse.effectiviteit: High - this is the turning point of the sermon.

appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the authority of literary figures (Tolkien, Eliot) which reinforces the constative/academic tone.
